definitions.definition: Any of the joints between the bones of the fingers .
The curved part of the cushion at the entrance to the pockets on a cue sports table.
The kneejoint of a quadruped , especially of a calf ; formerly, the kneejoint of a human being.
A cut of meat of various kinds.
examples: Beef knuckle is from the knee joint. Pork knuckle , or ham hock , is from the joint between the tibia/fibula and the metatarsals of the foot of a pig, where the foot was attached to the leg.

definitions.definition: A convex portion of a vessel 's figure where a sudden change of shape occurs, as in a canal boat , where a nearly vertical side joins a nearly flat bottom.
A contrivance, usually of brass or iron, and furnished with points, worn to protect the hand, to add force to a blow, and to disfigure the person struck; a knuckle duster .
The rounded point where a flat changes to a slope on a piste .

main_definition: Any of the joints between the bones of the fingers .
secondary_definitions: ( sports , billiards , snooker , pool ) The curved part of the cushion at the entrance to the pockets on a cue sports table.
The kneejoint of a quadruped , especially of a calf ; formerly, the kneejoint of a human being.
A cut of meat of various kinds.
( obsolete ) The joint of a plant .
( shipbuilding ) A convex portion of a vessel 's figure where a sudden change of shape occurs, as in a canal boat , where a nearly vertical side joins a nearly flat bottom.
A contrivance, usually of brass or iron, and furnished with points, worn to protect the hand, to add force to a blow, and to disfigure the person struck; a knuckle duster .
( skiing , snowboarding ) The rounded point where a flat changes to a slope on a piste .
